sentence: Looking at the universe of stocks we cover at Dividend Channel , on 11/28/18, Six Flags Entertainment Corp (Symbol: SIX), Home Depot Inc (Symbol: HD), and Evergy Inc (Symbol: EVRG) will all trade ex-dividend for their respective upcoming dividends.

Six Flags Entertainment Corp will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.82 on 12/10/18, Home Depot Inc will pay its quarterly dividend of $1.03 on 12/13/18, and Evergy Inc will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.475 on 12/20/18.

As a percentage of SIX's recent stock price of $60.49, this dividend works out to approximately 1.36%, so look for shares of Six Flags Entertainment Corp to trade 1.36% lower - all else being equal - when SIX shares open for trading on 11/28/18.
Similarly, investors should look for HD to open 0.60% lower in price and for EVRG to open 0.81% lower, all else being equal.
Below are dividend history charts for SIX, HD, and EVRG, showing historical dividends prior to the most recent ones declared.
In general, dividends are not always predictable, following the ups and downs of company profits over time.
Therefore, a good first due diligence step in forming an expectation of annual yield going forward, is looking at the history above, for a sense of stability over time.
This can help in judging whether the most recent dividends from these companies are likely to continue.
If they do continue, the current estimated yields on annualized basis would be 5.42% for Six Flags Entertainment Corp, 2.40% for Home Depot Inc, and 3.23% for Evergy Inc.
In Monday trading, Six Flags Entertainment Corp shares are currently up about 0.2%, Home Depot Inc shares are up about 1.7%, and Evergy Inc shares are up about 0.1% on the day.
